post.body: Square images are best but I can crop a rec to fit. Size is unimportant. Silver comes out gray no matter what though.
Should have all the RN players completed and on-line 2day. Been busy on it. E-mail me the CD cover for yours :)
I'm back to the routine of all work and no play. Well, I got what I asked for :)
I'll come over to borrow it then. Setting rail with an axle assembly as a guage would be fruitless :)
Athearn is very stable rolling stock and is easily kit-bashed to make anything you want. I own some very old ones too.
I think the secret to keeping olive oil fresh is to keep it in a dark cabinet. Exposure to light allows it to go rancid.
I looked it up and the Tomatoberry is only available from Park. They have an online catalog.
All I've been doing is washing dishes for 5 days. Enough with the Christmas cooking and eating :)
New Years day is when Bugs Bunny lays colored chicken eggs and hides them for children to find.
We'll show them what a real hippie is. Not that we know from experience because they all died in 1970.
Next year we're getting an old VW bus and heading south, all the while pretending it's 1968 again.
Been busy nursing an ailing PC back to health. Slow but sure, which is normal for Windows :(
Nothing that another gallon of coffee and a bottle of Ibuprofen won't solve :)
Never saw them for sale anywhere before, so that's why I learned to make them.
Wow! The government bailed out my failing pet Octopus business! What will I do with $150,000,000.00? Life is good :)
I'll probably have 100 photos to submit. Kalmbach will probably publish a couple of them in the next June issue of MR.
That's exciting! Our trains are HO scale and next week we start building scenery on the layout for picture perfection!
Busy mastering the technique of making Icelandic Candles for the Christmas gathering. Requires a special touch for perfection.
Not convinced that Reviver really is working.
Just set up a free website on webng & put your photos there, then IMG SRC from that to whatever site you want. Free and easy.
